Name: Monastiraki
Description: A bustling area known for its vibrant flea market, historic sites, and proximity to ancient landmarks like the Acropolis.

Name: Syntagma
Description: The heart of Athens, home to the Greek Parliament and a major transportation hub, offering a mix of government buildings and shopping.

Name: Psiri
Description: A lively nightlife area with numerous bars, restaurants, and art galleries, making it one of the city s trendiest neighborhoods.

Name: Kerameikos
Description: An archaeological area known for its ancient cemetery and proximity to the trendy Gazi neighborhood, filled with cafes and bars.
